job_title: Certified Clinical Medical Assistant in Santa Rosa, CA
cons: There are no cons so far

pros: You are serving the community of Bridgeport.
cons:
Poor communication between different departments, clinical roles, and between administration. Lack of training in staff. There are not clear guidelines and workflows in place. Expectations to work overtime without pay to complete charts, in-baskets, and paper work. Meetings are always scheduled during lunch time. Schedule is not blocked for meetings or in-services. No administrative time to complete paperwork or work through in-baskets. There is high provider burn out.

There is a constant push to increase productivity and they focus on providers to drive that. This push has caused a lot of concerns regarding practicing safely.  This causes more opportunities for providers to make mistakes .

review_title: Avoid this place at all cost
pros: They are no Pros to this place
cons:
Stay away at all cost:
1. They don’t believe in advancement or growth
2. They don’t believe in giving out raises or bonuses 
3:Management causes a hostile working environment and they bully, harass and surveillance you
4: If you call out sick or take personal time off, you are questioned, interrogated, guilted and at times force to come in
5: At this place, your never appreciated and if you want a raise, you have to request it 
6: The CEO doesn’t care at all about the issues and only cares about rewarding people, with food or baking cookies. 
7: This place is beyond oppressed and when you walk through the multiple sites, the moral doesn’t exist and it’s very depressing.

Everyone is quitting to have something better

Don’t listen to them because they will, break all your hope, expectations and the clear vision of the future will be shattered like glass.

pros: Weekends off, paid holidays, close when too much snow
cons: Salary pay and lunch meetings that are not paid

pros: Helps the community for their Heath care needs
cons: Staff is unprofessional. Needs conflict resolution within management team.
